extendedInfo.description: Over 270 unique points of interest (POIs) throughout Great Smoky Mountains National Park. A 60+ minute audio/auto tour, GPS-enabled/custom-made mapÂ which work without a cell/wifi connection, daily Ranger-Led events schedule, sunrise/sunsets data for over a year,  125+ photographs, 45 hiking trail descriptions, waterfalls guide, a special Safety section, and details on camping, bicycling, fishing,Â horse riding, restrooms, and picnicking.RICH CONTENT: + Content has been written by a professional travel writer - not copy-and-pasted from the Park Service website!+ Over 125 photographs of park, featuring the works ofÂ Ron Hutchinson+ Descriptions for 45 of the most popular hiking trails with the park.+ Unique Safety section which details all the concerns while visiting the park.+ Location and description of EVERY restroom in the park!+ Location and description of EVERY picnic area lot in the park!+ Details on camping, fishing, and horse riding throughout the park!MAPS: + NO CELL/WIFI CONNECTION REQUIRED! Download all the maps for offline usage.+ High resolution, topographic maps which you can edit!+ Carriage roads intersection labels.+ Hiking trails for the entire park.+ Interactive map annotations.Â  + GPS "where am I" function for the entire Park (does not work on non-GPS enabled devices such as the iPod Touch) Â  AUDIO/AUTO TOUR: + 60+ minute audio tour by a professional voiceover artist.Â + 100 points of interest on the History of the Park, Cades Cove, New Found Gap Road, and Roads Less Traveled in the park.RANGER-LED EVENTS SCHEDULE: + Daily National Park Service Ranger-led events are pre-loaded and updated automatically.+ Includes the time, optional fees, accessibility, meeting location, and description. + View multiple days of events.+ Updated on a regular basis.SUNRISE/SUNSET: + Sunrise and sunset data for three of the best locations in the park+ View any date within 365 days into the future+ Updated on a regular basisINTERFACE: + Universal National Park Service symbols. + Search all content within the app.+ Favorites feature.PUSH NOTIFICATIONS: + Push notifications for park-related news, alerts, and events.+ Push notifications as soon as they are available.For more details on this and other Chimani apps for the national parks, visit www.chimani.com. Be sure to follow us on Twitter at twitter.com/chimani and Facebook at www.facebook.com/chimaniAndroid Permissions Request ExplanationFor human readable explanations on why this Chimani app is requesting various permissions on your device, please refer to our privacy policy at http://www.chimani.com/privacy.html.

reviews.title: Great application
reviews.comment: Very detailed, doesn\'t require the interwebs, so it works in remote locales. More detailed maps would be great though.
reviews.author: Christopher Grant

reviews.comment: Great if going to Smokies. Would like more in-depth maps.
reviews.author: Kelly Meineke

reviews.title: Must Have
reviews.comment: This app worked great and came in incredibly usefu l during my visit. Also, the information helped to plan the day. No issues, a must have for a Smokey Mtn trip.
reviews.author: B. Washington

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Worth downloading
reviews.author: John Preto

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great for a trip to the smokys.
reviews.author: Keith Kirby

reviews.comment: Great helps me plane all of my trips
reviews.author: brooks Torbett

reviews.comment: Huge help for tourists
reviews.author: Jacob Mcright

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: donielle deangelis

reviews.comment: Best waterfalls
reviews.author: Kath B

reviews.comment: Good app
reviews.author: Annabelle Johnson

reviews.title: Ter Ter
reviews.comment: This app has been very useful to us, as we have started doing day hikes in the Smoky Mountains. We Love it!
reviews.author: Terry Breeden

reviews.title: Okay app
reviews.comment: Has good information available. But requires AirMail which can\'t be found. Some parts of the app don\'t work like sunrise/sunset and ranger activities. I assume these are connected to AirMail.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible app, disappointed
reviews.comment: This app crashes often, tries to download some crap called \"AirMail\" every 20 seconds, and has surprisingly little information. Razr Maxx ICS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Smoky mountain
reviews.comment: We have been going to the smoky mountains for 25 years and you can use all the help you can get. Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: 5 Stars - even with some suggested improvements. I\'d like it to link with Google navigation. I\'m sure the Photo gallery takes space and is not all that useful. A search for \"nearest\" would be useful (e.g. restroom).  I expected the audio to be narrations for various trip stops but it simply reads shown text - save space by removal. App will install to SD card - a must because of app size. Great text and descriptions of points of interest. Organized well. Map is awesome and clicking on markers will take you to descriptions of each point. Works without cell or wi-fi connection - as inside the park. I would pay for this app again.  Recommended!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Marianne
reviews.comment: Has potential, but currently missing descriptions of many trails, even less obscure ones like Bull head (to LeConte - @ Rainbow falls, & Old Settlers)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Airmails Control Panel?
reviews.comment: I can\'t get it through Google Play, but the app prompts me every time I try to open it. It looks like it might be a pretty good happens general, but since it depends on another unavailable app, it\'s really only worth an uninstall.
reviews.author: Neil Norman

reviews.title: Problems!
reviews.comment: Unfortunately it crashes every time I go to use the map. Also, there is a reminder that nags you to install airmail for live updates/events. Pretty pointless because Play store has no idea what to do when you click okay. Does not exist.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app! Works well when planning last minute hikes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DY
reviews.comment: Nice tool for exploring the Smokies
reviews.author: Daniel Young
